website_summaries.verdict: A sleek design that won't take up space, and can be set-up quickly at parties.
pros: Designed specifically for beer pong and with graphics and structural features that pay homage to a party game that many now expect when friends entertain
Taller than expected, providing ease of use for your guests
cons: There are some reports that this table doesn't hold up well with extended use

customer_reviews.title: 1 use, ruined.  It CANT get wet!
customer_reviews.text: This got wet during a party and the top layer of started bubbling. If you do buy it, make sure you keep it dry (which is funny since this table was designed for drunk people throwing balls into cups of beer). I've only used it once and now with out a flat surface its more than just a table with holes in it. Does not fold easy, but when it does it is compact. the 'velcro' pen pouch had already fallen off before I unpacked it. I do not recommend, not worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Joseph Marques

customer_reviews.title: NOT WORTH YOUR MONEY!
customer_reviews.text: I think i just paid for something to give me more of a hassle and be a pain than just not having this product at all. FIrst of all the sticker or paint that is written on each side of the table, some of it was already coming off when we first opened the table. We played one round of BP and one of the legs collapsed on us, meaning many cups of beer and water were spilled on our carpet. To just clarify points, the legs were not sturdy, the paint was coming off, the table itself is flimsy, and therefore not worth your money.
customer_reviews.author: Karen L

customer_reviews.title: Great table for the money!
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product! Used for first party - be sure to wipe up spills...or is resistant with a laminate like coating, but we didn't wipe up the spills and it seeped under the rim of the metal and swelled the border under they laminate. Bent the hinge on the legs first use trying to put away. Used to much force - so a little upset. But - instructions clearly cover both of these issues.
customer_reviews.author: Erik

customer_reviews.title: Excellent quality for the price. Very sharp looking. Makes a great gift.
customer_reviews.text: Bought as a gift. I examined it before wrapping. It looks great, doesn't look cheap at all. For the price it's an excellent value. Be aware though that it may not clean very easily with spills so don't let liquids sit on it for long. You could spray it with clear waterproof spray and that'll fix it. Overall great value.
customer_reviews.author: Mr. Spellbinder

customer_reviews.title: Not bad for what it is.
customer_reviews.text: This works pretty well and it's nice that the cups don't move, although it takes some time to get used to the toss since the cups are lower than usual. The main thing lacking from this item are covers for the holes because you can't really use it for anything else. It's literally only for beer pong, which is a pity because it's a good-sized table that could be used for other things. I'm trying to figure out how to cover the holes and use it as a crafting table. I mean, how often do you play beer pong?
customer_reviews.author: Dysonrules

customer_reviews.title: Great table,
customer_reviews.text: Great table! Some reviews said it's too short, it's definitely not though. In fact, it's just slightly taller than most other portable pong tables. It's shorter than a standard 6 foot folding table, but this is 8 feet long, which creates a nice "feel". Dry erase works well, cup holders work (but prevent certain custom stack arrangements), and customer service is super nice as well. The only thing is, the legs stick a little. Use W-40 and you're set.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel Costa

customer_reviews.title: A little disappointed in the sturdiness of the product
customer_reviews.text: The table came in good condition (no scratches, scuffs, etc). I was happy to see that the table could be different heights (I guess if you had to sit vs standing or were handicapped/in a wheelchair, it's a really nice touch). I am slightly disappointed in the sturdiness of the product. I can't imagine a group of rowdy college kids (or adults, for that matter) playing this and not knocking beers off or sloshing them all over when the table is bumped.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly H

customer_reviews.title: Great party table!
customer_reviews.text: Love this beer pong table! I got it for my fiancé’s beerthday olympics party and it works wonderfully! Table arrived in perfect condition with all of the balls
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Lasted less than 5 months.
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this table in December, so I’ve had it less than 5 months, and it’s junk now. I left it open for the first 3 months of owning it and it was great. The first time I closed it, a metal piece snapped. It was still usable, but it was hard to close afterwards. Two weeks later, two other parts snapped and now I can’t close it at all and it’s very unstable. It almost collapses if barely moved (impossible to avoid with drunk people around). I’m super disappointed and so is the person I bought this for as a Christmas present!!! 😞
customer_reviews.author: Savanah

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: I love everything about this table. I've had it for a little over a year and have had no real issues with it. It is light weight and cleans very easily! As long as you don't have anyone lean on it and you clean it up the next morning you'll definitely get your money out of it! I left mine in the sun over Memorial Day weekend, well over 100* F, the only thing that happened was the foam that holds the ping pong balls fell off. The glue couldn't handle the heat. I glued it back up and it's been fine since! I'll definitely order again in the future if this one ever gets destroyed.
customer_reviews.author: Alex Walker

customer_reviews.title: Dope table for parties or kick backs. Fits in my truck or back seat with ease
customer_reviews.text: Till this day I get complements about this table. Best thing I’ve ever bought.
customer_reviews.author: Mathew Jimenez

customer_reviews.title: Lots of fun.
customer_reviews.text: This has been a lot of fun playing during this pandemic. I have a 11,13,15&21 that have become pros. It’s nice to keep active with it indoors living in Arizona.
customer_reviews.author: Margaret Hummel

customer_reviews.title: Its okay...
customer_reviews.text: For the price of this pong table it’s kind of cheaply made. When closing the table legs, you have to be careful not to pinch your fingers because you have to press kind of hard. It’s also short. I expected it to be a lot taller than what it actually is. I’m not completely dissatisfied but I guess it will work for now.
customer_reviews.author: Kristin

customer_reviews.title: The aluminum making table foldable is very weak.
customer_reviews.text: Nice table, table is not as strong as it looks. It is easily bent during shipping or packaging, because as I opened the table I noticed it arrived damaged and bent already. I just now opened the table and realized, so here’s my rating. Nice table, cool concept, portable but be careful when DRINKING and playing cause it is very frail and easily bent. One small bent and table wont open nor close. Make sure you ready to go through returning hassle to receive a working table if it arrives damaged cause its a nice table, just might not have it working the first time its shipped.
customer_reviews.author: Juan

customer_reviews.title: Cup holes are not my favorite
customer_reviews.text: Great beer pong table! Adds lots of fun to get togethers and parties. I returned the whiteboard one since there are holes for the cups to sit in, it makes it difficult to re-rack the cups and sometimes the ball falls through them once you take some cups out. Will be purchasing the black one instead.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie Pajak

customer_reviews.title: Good quality table.
customer_reviews.text: The legs were a little stiff at first, but they do fold better once broken in. When you first open and close the table, do it carefully! You don’t want to bend the folding metal mechanisms. The table is durable and there’s a cool little foam holder on one side for ping pong balls under the table.
customer_reviews.author: Mark

customer_reviews.title: Good buy!
customer_reviews.text: My first ever table and defenitly a good buy. Table folds/unfolds easy. Nice storage area under table for pong balls.
customer_reviews.author: Master Wayne

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Table
customer_reviews.text: We think it's awesome. We've never had a legit beer pong table, so our expectations are pretty low. But we overall love it.
customer_reviews.author: ZoesMama

customer_reviews.title: Tailgate Champion
customer_reviews.text: Can throw a tablecloth over it and it's a nice accessible serving table. Food service done, time to take that tablecloth off and start the pong / flip-cup. Ability to quickly fold and store is paramount for when it's time to go into the game. Very good buy for any tailgate operation.
customer_reviews.author: Zachary M. Mitchell

customer_reviews.title: Not bad
customer_reviews.text: Love having friends write stuff on the table. Only issue I have is the holes for the cups, I knew what I was buying but after purchase and use, I realized once you make a cup you joe have a hole in the board lol and re-racking is challenging. But I haven’t had any cups spill over and make a mess yet so that’s always a plus
customer_reviews.author: Brandini

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT SPILL ON IT.
customer_reviews.text: Great product and would be the best if this was waterproof. First time used water cup got spilled over the table and it started to swell up in the table and have swell spots. Second time used more swelled spots from spills and now cracks on the top layer. Might be able to use it one last time but for a beer pong table it should be waterproof...
customer_reviews.author: Johnny Sichanthavong

customer_reviews.title: Great Party Starter
customer_reviews.text: Let the good times roll. Ordered these for a restaurant that wanted to add a game night and they a big, durable and a lot of fun.
customer_reviews.author: LoveAmazon

customer_reviews.title: AWESOME
customer_reviews.text: Great table! Easy set up and close down! Convenient to store in small spaces too
customer_reviews.author: Kelly Thai

customer_reviews.title: Scrap metal anyone?
customer_reviews.text: An absolute goddam horror. Right out of the box, every hinge and folding side of the table is completely bent to the point that I could NOT open the table what so ever. In fact the jagged edges poked and cut me trying to get it back in the box to return. The table is essentially a card board cut out of an American flag, on top of cheaply made metal. Not worth the $100+ and not worth anyone’s time. Hopefully my pictures will do my words justice because this table desecrated an American flag.
customer_reviews.author: emmanuel

customer_reviews.title: Great look, mechanics are so-so
customer_reviews.text: This is a really cool design and it's made to last. It's the perfect height in my opinion so I don't know why some people were complaining it's too short. I will say the drawback for me is when it's time to fold it back up, the legs are pretty stiff and don't move. I don't want to apply too much force and break them but they are really tight and hard to put back in place. I wish that was different.
customer_reviews.author: Sam

customer_reviews.title: sturdiness: OK, hinges not opening 180 degrees: NOT OK
customer_reviews.text: While the sturdiness is appropriate for holding 22 cups, this table fails at its one real job in life. It fails at providing a FLAT 8 foot long surface to play beer pong. The inaccurate placement of the hinges resulted in some hinges not opening to a full 180 degrees. It was so bad, that the middle legs were in the air. Using a metal file and removing material I was able to "fix" all but one of the hinges. Now it is almost flat. EDIT: balls don't bounce too nicely either, the table dampens the bounce
customer_reviews.author: Orthwarp

customer_reviews.title: ... a gift and from the looks of it they love it! easy to use and it folds up ...
customer_reviews.text: I gave this beer pong table as a gift and from the looks of it they love it! easy to use and it folds up quick and easy! It also has handles to make it easy to carry from place to place. It comes with its own balls so you dont even have to buy any! The american flag picture on the table is awesome!!
customer_reviews.author: Julianne

customer_reviews.title: Worth it!
customer_reviews.text: My husband ordered this table for a party and everyone loved it! Sturdy, light enough to easily move but heavy enough not to tip or move while playing.
customer_reviews.author: Akeemi

customer_reviews.title: Good for light use
customer_reviews.text: It appeared to be a good purchased for light use. The leg was loose and i decided not to repurchase because I need something more sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: SANDY G

customer_reviews.title: It's been a while and after bringing this to every party, it still looks shiny and does the job.
customer_reviews.text: It's been a while and after bringing this to every party, it still looks shiny and does the job. The only down side is it is a little short, but nobody has noticed and it hasn't caused problems with playing the game.
customer_reviews.author: Jorri Carter

customer_reviews.title: Most have!!!
customer_reviews.text: I love this table. Perfect size well I wish I could have thought about 8ft and gotten and smaller one. This table is easy to fold, portable and sturdy. I recommended to anyone that wants to have fun playing beer pong. Keep in mind 8ft is a long table. If you have a small space go for 6ft.
customer_reviews.author: Astrid Portillo

customer_reviews.title: Easy to clean!
customer_reviews.text: I take this thing with me camping in the woods and it stands great! Massive length and easy to clean!
customer_reviews.author: Onnie

customer_reviews.title: Play ball!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect table for beer pong or food. Only complaint is that the ball holder under the table doesn’t really work well. They fall out all the time.
customer_reviews.author: Shannon C.

customer_reviews.title: Nope...
customer_reviews.text: This table did not stand correctly. It kept buckling and was just a mess. At one point it actually tipped over. Beer everywhere!
customer_reviews.author: MOM OF THREE

customer_reviews.title: worked great
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for our hotel ballroom anniversary party. Nice looking, great quality
customer_reviews.author: Cab

customer_reviews.title: Don’t waste your money
customer_reviews.text: Not good quality at all and not worth the price at all very disappointing product not only that but it’s too short the table sits way to low and it feels very cheap would never buy and definitely won’t recommend. Don’t waste your money just get an 8ft table from Costco it would be better quality and worth the buy unlike this
customer_reviews.author: Marcos

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend
customer_reviews.text: This table surpassed my expectation when we received it in the mail. It was easy to fold/unfold, carry, and clean. There is no compressed wood or cheap plastic to be found. My husband loves this table and his buddies have since purchased a few. There is a spot under the table to hold a few balls for storage and you can use dry erase markers on the top of the board.
customer_reviews.author: Shannon W.

customer_reviews.title: Arrived broken
customer_reviews.text: We ordered this table for our annual family 4th of July tournament. It arrived today broken and not usable. There is a crack in the table, and there are large gaps and twisted metal so the storage sections of the table don't line up when unfolded. So disappointed, especially since we won't be able to get a new one in time for the 4th.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed!!!
customer_reviews.text: We just opened this for fathers day and the product (not the box) was damaged on top making it impossible to play.
customer_reviews.author: Robin J. Cox

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase!
customer_reviews.text: This thing is awesome! It’s very sturdy and easy to fold.
customer_reviews.author: chad

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Has worked out great for college boys! Very easy to transport, especially with the handles. Durable and good size
customer_reviews.author: Shannon Bromberg

customer_reviews.title: Great for a tradeshow table
customer_reviews.text: I was using this for a trade show table because it is 8 feet long and folds compact.
customer_reviews.author: AmazonAddicted

customer_reviews.title: Pretty good table
customer_reviews.text: Seems like a good table. Gave it 4 stars just because he dry erase surface seemed to scratch easily.
customer_reviews.author: David B.

customer_reviews.title: The dry erase is awesome!
customer_reviews.text: It's great for keeping your cups uniform, but it does limit the positions of the cups. You can't reconfigure the cups in every shape for Beer Pong, but it still works pretty well.
customer_reviews.author: Philip

customer_reviews.title: Husband loved the table.
customer_reviews.text: Ordered the black and white table for our Halloween party and it worked perfectly. Easy to clean off any spills, set up and take down was easy! It's nice that it comes with 6 balls but the Styrofoam ball holder wasn't even attached to the table. It fell off because they used hot glue. All in all though great table! We'll see how it holds up now at the Christmas party!
customer_reviews.author: DComics

customer_reviews.title: It’s ok
customer_reviews.text: Super flimsy. Moves a lot. Can easily be flipped over. Upside you can draw on it
customer_reviews.author: Oriana

customer_reviews.title: Great Birthday Gift!
customer_reviews.text: This is my birthday present to my husband. Great product for the price but i need an assistant to fold it. Some part maybe hard to fold.
customer_reviews.author: Yollyvera mae Sanchez

customer_reviews.title: I love this table
customer_reviews.text: I love this table. I bought just the regular black one. I read a review saying you can't really bounce it in. It is weird to bounce it in but my dad gets me every time. The table seems small at first but I personally think it's the perfect height. The table works for what it's suppose to. But make sure no one falls on it cause it may break/bend. The table is water resistant not water proof. It says in the instructions to wipe it with a towel after every game. I'm sure if you do all of this the table will last a long time. Would definitely buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Awesome table!
customer_reviews.text: For everyone thinking this table is too short, its not. I'm 6'2" and my team mate is 6'6" and we think its a great height. I don't ever find myself having to bend down or anything, except for my balls when they're on the floor. There was a small dent in the side of the table but I was able to straighten it out, it was just cosmetic. The Flag design looks great and seems really durable. I'd like to order another one in a different design because they're so nice. You can even use them as a dinner table if you need to.
customer_reviews.author: Jakers

customer_reviews.title: Great for the BBQ's we host
customer_reviews.text: Great for the BBQ's we host. Slim storage and case so it doesn't take up too much space in the garage when not in use. This table always livens up the party.
customer_reviews.author: Jaime927

customer_reviews.title: FUN
customer_reviews.text: Light weight and easy to set up. Perfect for our backyard events.
customer_reviews.author: superkat619

customer_reviews.title: Longer then expected, love it!
customer_reviews.text: Longer then expected, looks great and seems to be good quality, but I’ll get back you after our party...
customer_reviews.author: Chelsea Sullivan

customer_reviews.title: Good but not great
customer_reviews.text: It’s a good table for what it is. It’s a bit pricey for the overall quality of the product. Only issue I’ve had is that the legs are hard to snap into the right position, and the table is extremely low to the ground. It also isn’t very sturdy. It’s about what you’d expect from a fold up table. It isn’t horrible, isn’t great, but it gets the job done.
customer_reviews.author: Houston Whillock

customer_reviews.title: 'Murica
customer_reviews.text: You can't beat the money for this table. It looks just as depicted in the picture, and yes it can be set to play a standard game of beer pong. Spencers tries to sell these for around $150, but you're better off buying here. It has two height settings: one at knee level, the other at waist level. I've had it for a couple months now and it's held up just fine. Definitely worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: bma0214

customer_reviews.title: This table folds up nice and compact
customer_reviews.text: This table folds up nice and compact. It has a nice sleek look as well. I am very happy with the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Christopher Phillips

customer_reviews.title: No matter your political affiliation, we all love America, beer, and beer pong.
customer_reviews.text: I get to play beer pong and love my country at the same time! I have a friend who is politically opposed to me, so I got him this table for his birthday, so we can both agree we love america, beer, and beer pong. Helps with the political fights.
customer_reviews.author: Joshua E. Merry

customer_reviews.title: Cool buy
customer_reviews.text: Cool table, it's longer, narrower, and shorter than I'm used to but it's a cool buy. It folds up for storage and the ping pong balls bounce quite nicely on the surface. Looks like the picture but I don't feel like it's the sturdiest of tables. It does the job though and I would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: JenniH

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: Having a lot of fun with this thing! Super lightweight and portable. IT's durable and easy to store as well!
customer_reviews.author: Thomas Andolino

customer_reviews.title: Great product.  Lots of fun
customer_reviews.text: As described- a folding beer pong table. Very light and easy portable. The whiteboard aspect is great too.
customer_reviews.author: Bryan B

customer_reviews.title: Fun
customer_reviews.text: This was a gift for the hubby, it only had a small bend in the frame upon arrival but was easily bent back by hand. Otherwise its perfect. A bit stiff opening it but you just have to take your time, can't just slam it open and closed(which is a good thing when you have been drinking, no smashed fingers). Top cleans up nice from spills. Nice heavy build.
customer_reviews.author: Kat0920

customer_reviews.title: Don’t send me a Barbie doll house
customer_reviews.text: I’d love to give this product 5 stars, but I received beer pong balls and a Barbie doll house instead of the table. Cruel joke by someone in Amazon’s fulfillment center!!!
customer_reviews.author: Jimmy Tree

customer_reviews.title: What a great beer pong table
customer_reviews.text: We're thrilled with the quality of this table. It's sturdy and the appearance is fantastic.
customer_reviews.author: Scott Miller

customer_reviews.title: Mobile, easy to customize, and tons of fun!
customer_reviews.text: This table is awesome! I love the fact that you can customize it with your stickers/decals. One thing I would fix is making the ping pong ball holders a little tighter, every time I move the table the balls fall out. I fixed this by adding tape to the holder. I would ideally like the table 2 inches higher, but if that ruined the mobility of the table I would choose mobility over height. This table is so easy to carry or take anywhere, all of my friends are always asking me to bring it with me anywhere we go! It also works as a decent picnic table!
customer_reviews.author: Bhavik R. Kanzaria

customer_reviews.title: TABLE HAS HOLES FOR THE CUPS!
customer_reviews.text: THIS TABLE HAS HOLES IN IT FOR THE CUPS!!! Product should show picture with cups in ut right on the first page. Pretty disappointed, you cant do racks that you normally would. Buy another table from them, but not this one. Cups sit really low unless you buy their brand of bigger cups.
customer_reviews.author: Mark Smith

customer_reviews.title: Bought 2 I love this table!!!!
customer_reviews.text: This is the 2nd GoPong beer pong table. I just bought one for my brother because he's always borrowing mine. I use it in the yard in nice weather then in the house (with water in the cups) in the winter. It is ALWAYS in my trunk because it's portable and everyone always wants to play!!! Love love love!!!
customer_reviews.author: Cyline Breton

customer_reviews.title: Very sturdy!
customer_reviews.text: I love how sleek it is. It's very very sturdy. Held up great when we took it to the park!
customer_reviews.author: ambi

customer_reviews.title: Poorly Made
customer_reviews.text: A little disappointed with the quality of this item. The metal that makes the frame of the table is very flimsy. I bent one of the legs trying to close it the first times, with little force. I expected more for the price
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good, but with a couple problems
customer_reviews.text: I enjoy use of this table. The only problems I have noticed is that the middle legs do not reach the floor, they are slightly shorter thatn the legs at the ends. Also, the top is not quite liquid proof--be sure to mop up spills immediately or it bubbles the graphics/coating on the top.
customer_reviews.author: Renee

customer_reviews.title: Super Flimsy
customer_reviews.text: The table is easy to move because it is so light and flimsy. Even when it’s fully locked in position it moves all over the place.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda Gaetano

customer_reviews.title: Extremely Low Quality
customer_reviews.text: I read previous reviews and thought this table would be an excellent purchase, but i was extremely underwhelmed when opening this package. Some of the hinges on the package were rusted already, the balls and markers were just left in the box, not even packaged with the packaging for the stuff on the side and the table doesn't open flat, the parts where it unfolds is uneven and creates a table slanted at both ends. Starting to regret ordering from this manufacturer because it seems like somebody returned this table for defects then they just redistributed it to me.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew E.

customer_reviews.title: Lit
customer_reviews.text: Good product. When this comes out the party gets better and.... drunker
customer_reviews.author: jesse

customer_reviews.title: Works great beyond the quality issue and I suspect that changing ...
customer_reviews.text: Much more delicate than I expected. A few nuts/bolts worked loose just setting it up, so I had to hunt around and re-attach them. I'm actually quite hesitant to break it down in case the whole thing falls apart. Works great beyond the quality issue and I suspect that changing out the nuts and bolts for better quality ones would make a big difference.
customer_reviews.author: David

customer_reviews.title: Flimsy yet fun
customer_reviews.text: Table is kind of flimsy. Very portable and easy to put up/take down. Also, I got the “Used/Like new” one and It came with a crack in one of the panels, but it doesn’t affect the play. Overall a pretty good item but can easily be broken if someone had a few too many drinks.
customer_reviews.author: Jack Agnew

customer_reviews.title: Cheaply made. Beware the high price tag
customer_reviews.text: For what I paid for this item I figured it would be top notch. The table top is nice but the side bezel, frame, and legs are cheap aluminum and came damaged. Many dents and bent pieces of metal.
customer_reviews.author: Will Gegg

customer_reviews.title: This table is the star at parties!
customer_reviews.text: This table has quickly become the highlight of pool parties with my friends. It is awesome! Customer service is great as well!! Recommend buying their additional balls as well so you don't run out! Fast service thanks guys!
customer_reviews.author: Nichole Avila

customer_reviews.title: Good For Party
customer_reviews.text: Everyone Loved this table Especially my brothers who play beer pong! They loved it!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Table height to short.
customer_reviews.text: Legs are a bit short for my liking so I made some blocks to lift it. My son and I are over 6’ and the table is well below our waste.
customer_reviews.author: Midnight Express

customer_reviews.title: ... even though I saw some negative reviews and I'm glad we did
customer_reviews.text: We took a chance on this purchase even though I saw some negative reviews and I'm glad we did. We've used this several times and haven't had any issues! I saw some people say the poles bent, the design peeled, etc. We didn't experience any of that...maybe people were too rough with theirs??
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great for the price!
customer_reviews.text: Great table for all your BP champs out there, it came exactly as described and quickly for me, no damage was done to it during shipping. Its compact and travels easily so the party is where you are with your table. I thought the surface is not as hard as i thought it would be, feels flimsy. The rest seems to be made of aluminium so 1 BP dunk and this table is done for.
customer_reviews.author: Ben

customer_reviews.title: Was worried about other reviews.
customer_reviews.text: Other review said theirs was all bent up after using it, but I've used mine several times now, and at first i had to be careful because the hinges were tight *from being new* but. Now we have used it a few times I have no problems.
customer_reviews.author: AubryV

customer_reviews.title: Great table
customer_reviews.text: Great table so far. Arrived a little over a week ago (a day early actually, so awesome shipping service) and I've played a few games on it. Works great. Extending the legs when unfolding it is a little cumbersome, but manageable. Over all, I'm pleased with it and would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Mrs. Rich

customer_reviews.title: Bounce is a little dissapointing
customer_reviews.text: Would give 5 stars but the table top is thin plastic so the balls don't bounce very good or consistently. Other than that it's a very nice and easy table to set up. Totally worth $80
customer_reviews.author: Grant D.

customer_reviews.title: Good Beer Pong Table!
customer_reviews.text: Good beer pong table for a great price! This is the second summer we've had it and it works great. At first the table seemed a little short even after extending the legs but you definitely adjust to it. We've also put a tablecloth over it and used this as a food table for some of our cook outs and it was definitely sturdy enough. This table also folds up nicely for easy travel.
customer_reviews.author: Severiana

customer_reviews.title: Already warped after a week. Only used once.
customer_reviews.text: Got this table a week ago and had one party where it was used. Looked at it today and there's a huge piece that bubbled right up. For $100 I expected a lot more. Very unsatisfied
customer_reviews.author: Ramos

customer_reviews.title: Ideal
customer_reviews.text: Love it. Fits so easily in my car trunk. So nice to have for last minute events
customer_reviews.author: Andrea

customer_reviews.title: AWESOME BEER PONG TABLE!!!!
customer_reviews.text: LOVE THIS POOL TABLE!!! My friend was coming into town and we wanted to play some beer pong. It arrived quickly and was super fun!!!! Has little spots for the water cup, and the triangle to line up your cups. A lot of fun!!! Easy to clean and fold up.
customer_reviews.author: Sportzmaster87

customer_reviews.title: Really good table for a good price
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my boyfriend on his birthday. I love it because the way it collapses is easy, the table is really stable and it came with 6 balls. Really good table for a good price.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie N.

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: Very portable table and great for the price. Dry erase marker made it more enjoyable to play. Make sure to press cups down all the way as the holes all have varying fits. Overall great product and perfect for a game of beer pong.
customer_reviews.author: Sochetra Sor

customer_reviews.title: Lightweight table is easy to transport
customer_reviews.text: Nothing feels more patriotic than playing beer pong on an American flag. Lightweight table is easy to transport. Recommend!
customer_reviews.author: KMichelle

customer_reviews.title: ITS 2 FEET TALL
customer_reviews.text: The table is garbage. It’s only 2 feet tall. They failed to mention this anywhere in the description. Even after adjusting the height of the legs, it’s still way too undersized. Very disappointed and will be returning!!
customer_reviews.author: Casey

customer_reviews.title: Neat product but rather flimsy
customer_reviews.text: We were really excited when we got this. It was the perfect size, easy to transport, etc. But it's very flimsy. The hinges on the legs are thin aluminum, and it only takes one too many beers for someone to forget the hinge lock and try to fold up the table - bending or breaking the hinges in half, rendering the table useless.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan D. Meyer

customer_reviews.title: I like the design of this table
customer_reviews.text: I like the design of this table. It could be a little more sturdy. I thought the height was great.
customer_reviews.author: Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love!
customer_reviews.text: This is so cool, we use it all the time and have a blast! It's easy to set up and convenient to store!
customer_reviews.author: Jamie Campbell

customer_reviews.title: Best Party Table
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my boyfriend as a Christmas gift. He loves it. Sometimes thoigh when we set it up the silvers legs come apart. A bit tricky to get back in. Other than that its awesome and has foam on one end to hold the balls. It folds up really small and fits perfectly in my closet.
customer_reviews.author: Alyssa

customer_reviews.title: Great for the price.
customer_reviews.text: Looks great, very functional. The height is perfect and the table top has good bounce. Great quality for the price, the only thing that keeps it from a five star is it feels a bit flimsy. That said it has held up pretty well.
customer_reviews.author: Brendan C.

customer_reviews.title: Great for parties
customer_reviews.text: It is a great item for a party or hanging out with friends. The folding design makes it easy to transport from place to place. My only issue with it is that it will rust easily because of all the water/beer that will eventually leak onto the legs. Putting that aside unless you are one of those people who love to make your own, this is a great buy.
customer_reviews.author: Eric Bonvillain

customer_reviews.title: I would recommend
customer_reviews.text: Great table! I had a little problem with the first one I ordered. I emailed GoPong support and they had a new one shipped out ASAP. Great customer service, reasonable price and great table! Would 100% recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Cody Juarez

customer_reviews.title: Great for Alchys on the move..or in an APT
customer_reviews.text: This thing is great. I have used it a bunch of times over the summer. It is also great due to the fact that it can fold up and go under my bed. The only thing I wish this thing had was a little more height, but then I guess it wouldn't fold up as easily. Either way this thing has paid for itself this summer and I foresee it continuing to do so during football season.
customer_reviews.author: Al Golden

customer_reviews.title: Awesome BP Table!
customer_reviews.text: This table is awesome. We have used it at 3 different parties since we bought it 2 months ago and it is very sturdy. Love it!
customer_reviews.author: Alma

customer_reviews.title: very convenient beer pong table
customer_reviews.text: very convenient beer pong table. great design, and its foldable
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

product_meta.title: GoPong 8 Foot Portable Beer Pong / Tailgate Tables (Black, Football, American Flag, or Custom Dry Erase)
product_meta.description: The 8ft portable beer pong/flip cup table folds out from a compact briefcase size to 8' length so you can take them anywhere. Perfect for tailgating, house parties, bars, fraternities and more. Durable construction will withstand the test of time. Full regulation/tournament size.
feature_bullets: Upgrade your party: Portable 8 foot beer pong table made of high strength yet lightweight aluminum, 6 pong balls included
Official beer pong size: Regulation table for tournament brackets, 8 feet x 2 feet x 27.5 inches, weighs 25 pounds
Event day favorite: The center of attention at house parties, bbqs, tailgates, campsites, holiday weekends and more
Beer spills: Durable melamine beer proof playing surface withstands the rowdiest parties (do not leave table out in the elements)
Compact fold up design: Folds briefcase style for portability and neat storage, 2 feet x 5.5 inches x 2 feet

Average customer reviews has a small extra line on hover* https://omni-grok.amazon.com/xref/src/appgroup/websiteTemplates/retail/SoftlinesDetailPageAssets/udp-intl-lock/src/legacy.css?indexName=WebsiteTemplates#40*/.noUnderline a:hover {text-decoration: none;}
